zh: 这个问题已经被许多经济学家讨论过了。

en: Something must be done immediately to deal with this problem.
zh: 必须立即采取行动来解决这个问题。

en: We should consider this problem as a whole.
zh: 我们应该把这个问题作为一个整体来考虑。

en: This subject should be discussed in detail.
zh: 这个主题应该详细讨论。

en: This problem is too much for me to handle.
zh: 这个问题对我来说太难了，我处理不了。

en: This problem can not be discussed here for lack of time.
zh: 这个问题因为时间不够，不能在这里讨论。

en: I can't solve this problem.
zh: 我解决不了这个问题。

en: This problem is so easy that I can solve it.
zh: 这个问题太简单了，我能解决。

en: This question is too difficult for me.
zh: 这个问题对我来说太难了。

en: This problem is beyond me.
zh: 这个问题超出了我的能力范围。

en: This problem is difficult for me to some degree.
zh: 这个问题对我来说有一定难度。

en: I will deal with this problem.
zh: 我会处理这个问题。

en: This problem is akin to the one we had last year.
zh: 这个问题和我们去年遇到的那个问题类似。

en: This problem deserves considering.
zh: 这个问题值得考虑。

en: This matter had best be left unmentioned.
zh: 这件事最好不要提。

en: This problem is not so difficult as it seems.
zh: 这个问题不像看起来那么难。

en: This matter must not be trifled with.
zh: 这件事绝不可轻视。

en: This question isn't easy.
zh: 这个问题不容易。

en: This problem is too simple, so it is hardly worth discussing.
zh: 这个问题太简单了，所以不值得讨论。

en: I can't solve this problem. It's too difficult for me.
zh: 我解决不了这个问题。它对我来说太难了。

en: This subject is outside the scope of our inquiry.
zh: 这个主题超出了我们研究的范围。

en: This problem seems to be easy on the surface, but it's really difficult.
zh: 这个问题表面上看起来很简单，但实际上很难。

en: This was too difficult a problem for her to solve.
zh: 这个问题对她来说太难了，她无法解决。

en: This problem is a real challenge.
zh: 这个问题真是一个挑战。

en: This matter is of great importance.
zh: 这件事非常重要。

en: This problem is easier than that.
zh: 这个问题比那个简单。

en: This question has often arisen.
zh: 这个问题经常出现。

en: This problem demands immediate attention.
zh: 这个问题需要立即关注。

en: I close my mind to this subject.
zh: 我对此事闭口不谈。

en: This problem arose from the mutual misunderstanding.
zh: 这个问题源于彼此的误解。

en: This problem is too difficult to deal with.
zh: 这个问题太难处理了。

en: This question is closely related to that one.
zh: 这个问题与那个问题密切相关。

en: We will discuss this problem later.
zh: 我们稍后会讨论这个问题。

en: You cannot solve this problem in an ordinary way.
zh: 你不能用普通的方法解决这个问题。

en: This question counts for 50 points.
zh: 这个问题占50分。

en: This problem seems difficult.
zh: 这个问题看起来很难。

en: This matter is extremely important to us.
zh: 这件事对我们极其重要。

en: This problem is not so difficult that you can't solve it.
zh: 这个问题并没有难到你无法解决的地步。

en: I can't think of any solution to this problem.
zh: 我想不出解决这个问题的任何办法。

en: My desire is to help you with this problem.
zh: 我希望能够帮助你解决这个问题。

en: I don't know what the question means.
zh: 我不明白这个问题是什么意思。

en: Concentrate your attention on this problem.
zh: 集中注意力在这个问题上。

en: We will interview two people so we can hear both sides of this question.
zh: 我们将面试两个人，以便我们可以听到这个问题的双方意见。

en: All the answers to this question were wrong.
zh: 这个问题的答案都是错误的。

en: There were a lot of opinions, pro and con, on this question.
zh: 关于这个问题，有很多赞成和反对的意见。

en: As far as this problem is concerned, you cannot escape your responsibility.
zh: 就这个问题而言，你无法逃避你的责任。
